Items.Title: Application  no. C 110070 ZRY submitted by the Department of City Planning  pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, pertaining to medical offices and day care centers in the Borough of Staten Island and Bronx Community Board 10, and commercial regulations in the Borough of Staten Island.

Items.Title: Application no. 20115171 TCK, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of 149 Broadway Restaurant LLC d.b.a Dressler to continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at  149 Broadway, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 34.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, Eliminating within an existing R6B District a C1-2 District and establishing within an R6B District a C2-2 District (C080293ZMQ)
